html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-01692023-02-16DFO
ActFisheries Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Manitoba Fishery Regulations, 1987
PrecisRegulations Amending the MANITOBA FISHERY REGULATIONS, 1987 in order to (1) reduce the number of caught fish of certain species that can be retained in a day; (2) require more large fish of certain species to be returned to the water; (3) enable fishing year-round for most species in most waterbodies; (4) update the list of stocked waters to which certain fishing restrictions apply; (5) modify the species of fish that may be caught using non-angling methods of fishing or that may be used as bait; (6) add a conversion factor for commercially processed fish; (7) add the flexibility to carry an unsigned electronic version of a recreational angling licence; (8) change the information required to be displayed on ice fishing shelters; (9) require the earlier removal of ice-fishing shelters in certain parts of southern Manitoba; and (10) make administrative changes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0028 Publication Date: 2023-03-01
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Manitoba Fishery Regulations, 1987
precis: Regulations Amending the MANITOBA FISHERY REGULATIONS, 1987 in order to (1) reduce the number of caught fish of certain species that can be retained in a day; (2) require more large fish of certain species to be returned to the water; (3) enable fishing year-round for most species in most waterbodies; (4) update the list of stocked waters to which certain fishing restrictions apply; (5) modify the species of fish that may be caught using non-angling methods of fishing or that may be used as bait; (6) add a conversion factor for commercially processed fish; (7) add the flexibility to carry an unsigned electronic version of a recreational angling licence; (8) change the information required to be displayed on ice fishing shelters; (9) require the earlier removal of ice-fishing shelters in certain parts of southern Manitoba; and (10) make administrative changes.
